channel.title: How do i change player looks when they join?
channel.description: how do i change the clothes and items that players wear when they join my server?

item.title: How do i change player looks when they join?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search for this in your player (player.java)

	[CODE]//Giving the player an unique look[/CODE]

You will see something like this:

[CODE]	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-Item;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=Item;[/CODE]

Replace the “Item” with the item ids of the armor they start out with.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change player looks when they join?

item.title: How do i change player looks when they join?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Open player java. Search for: playerEquipment[playerHat]

I hope you get what the rest means.
